name: verify-planned-incident-details-in-text-view-traffic-hazard-page;issue-lt-396b-text-view-regression-browser-chrome-context-chrome-feature-lt25-text-view-lt-396-current-and-future-incident-list-capability-lt-25-text-view

tags.name: LT 25 Text View/LT-396 Current and Future incident list

title: Verify Planned incident details in text view Traffic Hazard page

userStory.storyName: LT-396 Current and Future incident list

testSteps.description: Given I am at the LiveTraffic Website
Then I click on the menu button
Then I click "List View" button from the menu list
Then I should see "All incident types" filter is turned off by default
When I turn "on" All incident type filter
And I turn "off" All incident type filter
Then I should see incident name as "Boggabilla (north of Moree)" and incident location as "Newell Highway between Lowes Rd and Mungle Back Creek"
Then I should see incident type as "SCHEDULED ROADWORK Major improvements" and incident region as "Regional NSW West"

Then I should see below incident details
| Title_Name | Info |
| Date & Time | Mon 6 Jan 2020 till Thu 31 Dec 2020 |
| Scheduled closures | Weekdays |
| Impact | Traffic affected in both directions. |
| Websites | Newell Highway upgrade |
| Advice | Exercise caution, Check signage |
| Advice | Reduced speed limit |
| Other Advice | Lane width reduced to 3.2m |
And I should see "View on Map" button in the incident details section
When I click "View on Map" button
Then I should see Incident display name as "Newell Highway between Lowes Rd and Mungle Back Creek"
